1164540049649594368.text: It is actually research scientists that brought this to our attention.  Forest clearing causes drying and drying causes more drying.  Amazonian trees are the pump that keeps water cycling between the biosphere and the atmosphere.https://twitter.com/CNN/status/1164386997634568194 …

1164542753000296449.text: The atmospheric spraying we're seeing in my area & in other regions in the last few yrs also has a desiccating effect leaving everything parched soon after a rain. The cloud condensation nuclei being used is drying everything out making it ripe for wildfires.pic.twitter.com/mw3fFim7Vx

1164894431952146437.text: Yes that article is extremely annoying, diction-wise. "Activists" and ye olde classic journalistic portrayal of the sides of an issue: "Activists say", as though it's one of a myriad of reasonable views, and the writer is a stenographer.

1164543232564486144.text: Its like going into a grain silo with fine uniform grains (i.e. CCN) in the air and then lighting a match.........poof!pic.twitter.com/6GOlU1KN9h
